We must take on the fossil fuel industry, accelerate our transition to clean energy, and finally put people before the profits of polluters. https://thinkprogress.org/fossil-fuel-industry-outspends-environment-groups-on-climate-new-study-231325b4a7e6/

On this day in 1965, Medicare and Medicaid were signed into law by President Lyndon B. Johnson. We must work to expand these critical programs that help millions of Americans access affordable health care and resist against any attempts to slash them. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DjYlTgJUcAYPChO.jpg
All the rights and gains we have, they’re never given to us as acts of charity and generosity by the rich and powerful. They are won by the struggle and sacrifice of people from below.

My conversation with Judge Kavanaugh reinforces my belief that he will evaluate cases before the Supreme Court from a textual and originalist point of view. I believe he will carefully adhere to the Constitution and will take his job to protect individual liberty seriously.
